snippet.title: Galactic Overlord : WiFi Multiplayer game for Windows Phone
snippet.description:
http://www.bestwp7games.com/galactic-overlord-bite-sized-battles-on-a-galactic-scale.html

Unite the stars under one galactic empire!

Galactic Overlord is a simple yet addictive real-time strategy game in which the player must race against time to capture all the planets and beat the other would-be overlords!

The player can compete either against one or more computer opponents or against another player over a shared WIFI connection.

== Single Player Modes ==

= Duel =
Battle an AI player for galactic supremacy!

= Three Way =
Battle two AI players at once!

= Cloaked =
Battle an unseen AI player!

= Asteroids =
A duel mode with moving planets that requires a more dynamic strategy!

== Multiplayer Mode ==
Challenge another human opponent in real time over a shared WIFI connection!
